name: bot-mox-project
description: Bot-Mox Project - Bot Farm Management System

scripts.deploy:local:restart: npm run stack:prod-sim:down && npm run stack:prod-sim:up
scripts.dev:prodlike:restart: npm run stack:dev:down && npm run stack:dev:up
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd proxy-server && npm install && cd ../bot-mox && npm install && cd ../agent && npm install
scripts.check:backend:syntax: node --check proxy-server/src/index.js && node --check proxy-server/src/observability/tracing.js && node --check proxy-server/src/observability/logger.js && node --check proxy-server/src/legacy-app.js && node --check proxy-server/src/bootstrap/runtime.js && node --check proxy-server/src/bootstrap/http-middleware.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/settings.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/bots.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/finance.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/infra.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/ipqs.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/wow-names.routes.js && node --check scripts.check:all: npm run check:styles:guardrails && npm run check:theme:contrast && npm run lint && npm run check:types && npm run build && npm run check:bundle:budgets && npm run check:secrets && npm run check:frontend:logging && npm run check:backend:logging && npm run check:backend:syntax && npm run check:backend:smoke && npm run audit:firebase:decommission
scripts.smoke:prodlike: npm run doctor && npm run test:e2e:prodlike
scripts.mcp:antd:setup: npm install --no-save https://codeload.github.com/ant-design/ant-design/tar.gz/refs/heads/master && node node_modules/mcp-antd-components/scripts/extract-docs.mjs node_modules/antd && npm uninstall --no-save antd
